entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late this afternoon with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
